relation: Great for these types of students
This is a very diverse campus - great for all types of students.
There are lots of campus activities. The town has lots to offer for nightlife and extra-curricular stuff.
The food court offers many divverent varieties of food prepared by the culinary arts students. I don't have any complaints.
This might depend on the program you are studying.
Get your math classes done early. Be up early on enrollment day because classes fill up quickly. Get involved in activities to get your face known to instructors and other students.
The campus is easy to navigate. They offer traditional brick and morter classes as well as online classes. The staff have been very helpful.
pageTitle: Lane Community College Reviews: Student Reviews and Ratings | Cappex

They are doing a $35,000,000 remodel to the center building in 2014 which will include the caffeteria. It will have all sorts of stations like Pan Asia, American Grill, Hispanic food, Indian food etc. I am very impressed with the plans I have seen., 115735=Campus will be 100% smoke free for the 2012/2013 school year., 137002=After going to school in the 80's and not going to college until 2011 everything was new and difficult for me , but with counseling and help I am on track and doing well!, 382215=© 2015, Cappex.com, LLC, 17352=Like most community colleges, LCC is a great value for the price, at an average of right around $1300 per term, including books it feels like a great value. This price covers 4 classes., 145554=The college does not currently offer any form of student housing, but will be opening deluxe student apartments for exorbitant prices at the beginning of the Fall 2012 term.}

textAfterTable: Great for these types of students Students who can not get into four year colleges. Students who have not been able to graduate. Students who are worried about being in a big school. Students who have children that are infant to toddler age that they want to be near. Lane has a great daycare!!!! Tips for prospective students Do your homework and always let your teacher's know ahead of time if you are not able to make it to class. If you have a child and want to be home with your child talk to your counselor and they will let them know that you would like to look into online classes. They are always happy to help! Bang for the buck Getting scholarships and loans for Lane Community College has been the easiest thing I have ever done. They make it easy by having an office just for getting money to pay for school! Am enjoying being here I enjoy being at Lane Community College because it is a smaller college and I have been able to make friends and in turn have made some study buddies. Lane also has really good online classes that make it easy for me to be a mother and
